title: Modern Times
description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

title: My Man Godfrey
description: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler, but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

title: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
description: A small-town tuba player inherits a fortune and moves to the city, where he is besieged by opportunists and a reporter looking for a story.

title: The Great Ziegfeld
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: The ups and downs of Florenz Ziegfeld Jr., famed producer of extravagant stage revues.

title: Dodsworth
description: A retired auto manufacturer and his wife take a European vacation, where they find their marriage disintegrating.

title: After the Thin Man
description: Nick and Nora Charles return to San Francisco and investigate a murder involving Nora's family.

title: Fury
description: A wrongly accused man survives a lynch mob attack and seeks revenge on those who tried to kill him.

title: The Petrified Forest
description: A disillusioned writer and a young waitress are held hostage by a notorious gangster in an Arizona diner.

title: Libeled Lady
description: A newspaper editor hires a fixer to compromise a socialite suing the paper for libel, leading to a complex romantic quadrangle.

title: Swing Time
description: A gambler and dancer goes to New York City to earn enough money to marry his fiancee, but falls for a dance instructor instead.

title: Camille
description: A Parisian courtesan falls deeply in love with a young man of modest means, but her past and his father threaten their happiness.

title: San Francisco
description: A saloon keeper and an opera singer fall in love and face personal and physical crises during the 1906 San Francisco earthquake.

title: The Story of Louis Pasteur
description: A biography of the French scientist who battled the medical establishment to prove his theories on microbes and sterilization.

title: Sabotage
description: A cinema owner is secretly a terrorist saboteur, and his wife begins to suspect his double life.

title: Secret Agent
description: Three British spies are sent to Switzerland to assassinate a German agent, but they wrestle with their consciences.

title: Show Boat
description: The daughter of a riverboat captain falls in love with a charming gambler, but their lives take separate paths.

title: The Charge of the Light Brigade
description: A British major orders a suicidal cavalry charge against a stronghold in India to avenge a massacre.

title: The Plainsman
description: Wild Bill Hickok, Calamity Jane and Buffalo Bill Cody face Indian uprisings and gun runners in the Old West.

title: These Three
description: Two women running a school for girls have their lives ruined by a malicious student's lie.

title: Come and Get It
description: A ruthless lumber tycoon sacrifices love for ambition, only to fall for the daughter of the woman he rejected years later.

title: Wife vs. Secretary
description: A publishing executive's wife becomes jealous of his beautiful secretary, leading to misunderstandings.

title: Follow the Fleet
description: Two sailors on shore leave look for romance and put on a show to help their girlfriends.

title: The Prisoner of Shark Island
description: The true story of Dr. Samuel Mudd, who was imprisoned for treating John Wilkes Booth after the Lincoln assassination.

title: The General Died at Dawn
description: An American mercenary tries to save peasants in China from a brutal warlord.

title: The Trail of the Lonesome Pine
description: A feud between two mountain families is complicated when an engineer arrives to build a railroad.

title: Anthony Adverse
description: An orphan travels the world in the 18th century seeking his fortune and true identity.

title: Dracula's Daughter
description: Countess Marya Zaleska seeks the aid of a psychiatrist to free her from her vampiric curse.

title: The Devil-Doll
description: A wrongly convicted man escapes prison and uses a shrinking technology to exact revenge on those who framed him.

title: The Walking Dead
description: A man is executed for a crime he didn't commit, then brought back to life by a scientist, seeking vengeance on his framers.

title: Bullets or Ballots
description: A detective goes undercover to bring down a crime syndicate.

title: César
description: The final chapter of Pagnol's Marseille Trilogy, focusing on the reconciliation of Fanny and Marius.

title: The Only Son
description: A mother sacrifices everything to give her son an education, but discovers he is living a meager life in Tokyo.

title: Osaka Elegy
description: A young woman becomes a mistress to pay off her father's debts and her brother's tuition, facing societal judgment.

title: Sisters of the Gion
description: Two geisha sisters with opposing views on men struggle to survive in the Gion district of Kyoto.

title: The Story of a Cheat
description: A man recounts his life of crime and deception, arguing that dishonesty has been his key to survival.

title: Rembrandt
description: The life of Dutch painter Rembrandt van Rijn, focusing on his later years and personal struggles.

title: Mayerling
description: The tragic true story of Crown Prince Rudolph of Austria and his lover Baroness Maria Vetsera.

title: Things to Come
description: A decades-spanning sci-fi epic depicting a future war, a post-apocalyptic age, and the rebuilding of civilization.

title: Intermezzo
description: A world-famous violinist falls in love with his daughter's piano teacher.

title: The Crime of Monsieur Lange
description: Employees at a publishing firm form a cooperative after their corrupt boss disappears, but trouble arises when he returns.

title: The Ex-Mrs. Bradford
description: A doctor and his ex-wife team up to solve a murder mystery at a racetrack.

title: Desire
description: A jewel thief meets an American automobile engineer in Spain and uses him to smuggle a stolen necklace.

title: Our Relations
description: Laurel and Hardy's twin brothers, sailors on shore leave, get involved in a mix-up with a valuable ring.

title: The Bohemian Girl
description: Gypsies Laurel and Hardy adopt a girl who turns out to be a princess.

title: Poor Little Rich Girl
description: A wealthy girl gets lost and joins a vaudeville radio act.

title: Romeo and Juliet
description: The classic Shakespearean tragedy about two star-crossed lovers from feuding families.

title: The Green Pastures
description: A retelling of biblical stories from an African-American perspective.

title: A Woman Rebels
description: A Victorian woman defies conventions by having a child out of wedlock and fighting for women's rights.

title: Satan Met a Lady
description: A detective gets involved with a lying beauty and a search for a priceless artifact in this adaptation of The Maltese Falcon.

title: Reefer Madness
description: A propaganda film about the dangers of marijuana, which leads high school students down a path of madness and murder.
